ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Floating Coffin
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry, but the Community Recopies page is a list of recopies that people have submitted that people would like to see implemented.  They don t actually exist
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry, but the Community Recopies page is a list of recopies that people
have submitted that people would like to see implemented. They don't
actually exist in game.

Tinik Gutenungrie
Gnomish Enchanter, Veeshan

-----Original Message-----
From: Jessgold01@... [mailto:Jessgold01@...]
Sent: Monday, August 28, 2000 12:44 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Floating Coffin


Greetings, Fellow Tinkerers!

I am Gertii, the Tinkering Gnomette of Grey <Xegony>. Various
members of my guild, The Greys <Xegony> have reached the lofty
heights of leveling where the are going to be needing some serious
help in carcass retrieval. I've been reading the community receipes
posted in Fulcrum's and saw one for a floating coffin. I was
wondering if anyone has actually made one of these and if it worked.
Also, if the first two are true, if there's anyone on Xegony, who is
of a high enough level to try and make one for me.

Thanks,

Gertii, the Tinkering Gnomette of Grey
